casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mickey Vonrice ROLLINS. No. 138P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2008. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for Rollins.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 658 S.E.2d 43.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of April 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2008."
